jml:joke.jml:title: Two Cows in a Field
jml:joke.jml:author: John Doe
jml:joke.jml:setup: Two cows are standing in a field eating grass.
jml:joke.jml:punchline: The second cow replies: "Hey, I was just gonna say that"!

jml:joke.jml:title: Mad Cows
jml:joke.jml:setup: The first cow: "Hey, did you hear about that mad cow disease?"
The second cow: "Yeah, but I'm not worried about it."
